item.description:
Gouveia Vineyards always provides a great time for the wine connoisseur (New and Old:-) The breathtaking view over the vineyard is a nice quick get away from the hussle and bussle of everyday life. Let us salute the promice of summer and all the beauty of tomorrow -our theme will be picnic foods be creative come up with the best "Finger lickin " appetizer and win a bottle of "Bottle of wine".  Music starts at 4pm "Be there or be Square :-) "

Bon Appetit
item.why: This is one of my Favorite Vineyards - Lets come together and Celebrate the "Sun" and all its warmth .

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "Lets Celebrate " Its Almost Summer at "Gouveia Vineyards"
